multiagent

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a task in the world and is associated to a cell. The task status is defined according to an Enum.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Albani Dario
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
